item.title: How to change prices in shops lol......(im a fr00b)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

OR you could say the second number.

First its the ID, then Name, Then Description, Then Something there, Then the shop price.

According to cloude, for his it would be the:

88000.2105575155

Read full topic
item.source: How to change prices in shops lol......(im a fr00b)

item.title: How to change prices in shops lol......(im a fr00b)
item.dc:creator: @Cloude7Strife Cloude7Strife
item.description:
@Cloude7Strife wrote:

go to items.cfg or whatever then you see all the items then go to item you want (make sure you aren’t on noted one) the noted one is the same item after the regular if you wanna put it that way then when you have the item to make sure it’s not note then look down under it and see if it has a examine like it’s a nice hat from a cracker. Depends on item then as you see there’s the price sometimes like this 6678.989898 for an example and then here’s dragon 2h as an example

Dragon_2h_Sword A_two-handed_dragon_sword. 88000.2105575155 88000.2105575155 132000.3495290539 as you look the numbers before the period are actually the sells and buys now im not sure which one is the sell or which one is the buy but i’m pretty sure 88000 is the sell and 132000 is the buy so if you want to change the sell(selling to store) then you’re most likely to change the smaller amounts and if you want to change the buy (from stores) it’s most
likely to change the higher one so if you wanted to change all it’d be something like this

Dragon_2h_Sword A_two-handed_dragon_sword. 1.2105575155 1.2105575155 1.3495290539 now theyre one gp in both categories. sell and buy if this is not a good tut i’ll try to explain in a different way

Read full topic
item.source: How to change prices in shops lol......(im a fr00b)
